# CoreX events - nats

This package provides an implementation of the CoreX events interface for nats.

## Installation
~~~bash
pip install corex-events-nats
~~~

## Usage
~~~python
from corex_events_nats.handler import NatsHandler
handler = NatsHandler()
handler.example_method()
~~~
